function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Analysis of antimicrobial resistance genes (ARGs) in influent's wastewater using qPCR technology.","Impact":"Potential for the spread of antimicrobial resistance and potential contamination of the environment.","Mitigation":"Implement strict guidelines for the disposal of wastewater containing antimicrobial resistance genes.","Technologies":"Advanced water treatment technologies for the removal of antimicrobial resistance genes.","People":"Communities exposed to wastewater effluents and individuals working in wastewater treatment facilities.","Owner":"Water treatment facilities and regulatory bodies."},{"Description":"Privacy issues in wastewater-based epidemiology (WBE), leading to potential stigmatization in certain communities.","Impact":"Risk of social stigmatization and community distrust, hindering public health efforts.","Mitigation":"Develop and adhere to ethical guidelines for WBE, and provide community education to address privacy concerns.","Technologies":"Data anonymization and encryption techniques for protecting individual privacy in WBE.","People":"Community members, public health officials, and researchers.","Owner":"Local health departments and research institutions."},{"Description":"Challenges in WBE surveillance of water and wastewater concerning COVID-19, including the non-existence of biomarkers discovery pipeline, accounting for population size fluctuations, need for biomarker extraction technology, and lack of analytical tools.","Impact":"Inability to accurately monitor and assess the presence of COVID-19 in wastewater, leading to potential spread of the virus.","Mitigation":"Invest in research and development for biomarker discovery and extraction technologies, and develop analytical tools for sensitive and selective analysis of COVID-19 biomarkers.","Technologies":"Advanced biomarker discovery techniques, real-time population monitoring technologies, and advanced analytical instruments for wastewater analysis.","People":"Public health officials, researchers, and wastewater treatment professionals.","Owner":"Government health agencies, research institutions, and technology developers."}]}
